page.title: 06LOCAL AMENITIES.
page.content: Children from the fourth year sent out forms asking local people what amenities they would like to see provided in Sheringham. Two hundred forms were delivered and thirty nine returned (19.5%) which was very disappointing. The people came in the following age groups:- under 20 {2 between 20 and 40 {11 between 40 and 60 {7 over 60 {19 Despite the differences in ages 35 out of the 39 wanted Sheringham to have a swimming pool. There are plans being discussed at the moment by the Council to have a pool in the town, but it would mean having a supermarket on the car park to help pay for it (it would cost Â£2,000,000). A lot of people are against this but when we move schools we will lose our school pool.
